      • hasPreloadedInterstitial

        public boolean hasPreloadedInterstitial()
        Query if a preloaded interstitial is available.
        Returns:
        true: ready to shown / false: You won’t be able to show an interstitial.

      • hasPreloadedOverlay

        public boolean hasPreloadedOverlay()
        Query if a preloaded overlay is available.
        Returns:
        true: ready to shown / false: You won’t be able to show an overlay.

        Query if a preloaded banner is available.
        Parameters:
        advertisementId - Advertisement Id
        Returns:
        true: ready to shown / false: You won’t be able to show a banner.
